New features in this release:

- 3D Touch: enabled shortcuts to Book a Stay, View Upcoming Reservations and your Account Info from the app icon
- Improved Directions: clickable hotel address in your active stay allows you to easily copy & pa

You asked and we listened! In this release, check out these new enhancements that make traveling easier:

- Modify Reservation: quickly change your date, rate and room type for your upcoming reservations.
- Marriott Rewards Account: get access t

You asked and we listened! In this release, check out these new enhancements that make traveling easier:

- Modify Reservation: quickly change your date, rate and room type for your upcoming reservations.
- Marriott Rewards Account: get access t

Here are the new features for you in this release:
- Improved Directions: clickable hotel address in your active stay now allows you to easily copy & paste, or to open in Apple Maps, Google Maps or Waze.
- Make a Green Choice: check out the new

Do more on the go! Here are our latest enhancements to make traveling easier:
- View & Edit Your Profile: update your personal information, earning preferences, and email subscriptions
- Edit Room Preferences: just indicate your preferences whil

Do more on the go! Here are our latest enhancements to make traveling easier:
- View & Edit Your Profile: update your personal information, earning preferences, and email subscriptions
- Edit Room Preferences: just indicate your preferences whil

- My Reservations: conveniently manage all your upcoming stays on one-screen with quick links to check-in, checkout, send mobile requests, call hotel, modify or cancel reservations and email or text st

You spoke. We listened. Redeeming points for stays is now easier than ever by:
- Searching by location and dates
- Expanding search options
- Selecting “Rewards Points” as your special rate
Once you’ve booked with points get instant, automatic

You spoke. We listened. Redeeming points for stays is now easier than ever by:
- Searching by location and dates
- Expanding search options
- Selecting “Rewards Points” as your special rate
Once you’ve booked with points get instant, automatic

6.6.1
This release is a bug fix for some of our members who were experiencing app crashes. We apologize for the inconvenience and are working around the clock to continue to bug fix and deliver improvements.

Let us know how else we can serve yo

- Hotel Info: While staying at our hotels, you can now quickly retrieve details around the fitness center and pools
- Elite Priority Late Checkout: Elite members will get an in-app confirmat

Here are the new features for you in this release:

- Find & Book: Search results are now more complete by showing hotels with availability and unavailability
- Detailed hotel info: Easily explore and book spa services at the hotel or nearby

Here are the new features for you in this release:

- Find & Book: Search results are now more complete by showing hotels with availability and unavailability
- Detailed hotel info: Easily explore and book spa services at the hotel or nearby

Here's what's new:
- Full app experience now available in Japanese
- Bug fixes and improved app performance

Thanks for your loyalty; we hope to see you soon. Until then, tell us what you think by rating us in the App Store.

6.8.1
This release includes iPhone X optimization, enhanced app performance and bug fixes.

Let us know how else we can serve you by rating us in the App Store. We appreciate your loyalty and look forward to your next stay!

Here's what's new:
- Mobile Key: Now with fewer steps for a more seamless arrival

2. Get an alert when your room is ready

• Book from 6,500 participating hotels and 29 brands

Here’s what to expect with our latest release:
• Unlock your door by saying “Hey Siri, unlock door” during your next stay. Note that this new Mobile Key shortcut for Siri is only available at select hotels.
• Bug fixes and improved app performance

• Vie

Say hello to Marriott Bonvoy™, combining Marriott Rewards®, The Ritz-Carlton Rewards® and SPG® into one program. Explore our updated app with brand-new features plus all your favorites:

- Various bug fixes and improvements.

Thank y

- Search and add upcoming reservations to your profile when you sign in. Ideal for bookings made outside the app or on behalf of someone else.
- View your stay history under My Reservations. See hotels booked within the last year, final bills and point

You spoke. We listened. It’s now easier to view and download final bills from past hotel stays. They’ll appear within 72 hours after checkout in Account Activity under the My Account screen. Note that this feature is based on availability.

Thanks
